snippet: Liu Xiaoyuan, a lawyer friend of the artist Ai Weiwei, said that Chinese officials had revoked the business license of Mr. Ai’s art production company.
abstract: Lawyer friend of Chinese artist and dissident Ai Weiwei says in an online posting that officials have revoked the business license of Ai's art production company.
lead_paragraph: Liu Xiaoyuan, a lawyer friend of the artist Ai Weiwei, said that Chinese officials had revoked the business license of Mr. Ai’s art production company.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
